common_left_pane_title:
"Digital identity is the passport to the
virtual world, where convenience and
connectivity effortlessly intertwine."
credentials_right_pane_bottom_paragraph_:
Please click the button to store your credential.
Go back to this screen afterwards to continue
credentials_right_pane_bottom_paragraph:
Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR
scanner to accept and store your credential.
credentials_right_pane_top_paragraph:
Let's add a {{credentialName}} Credential
to your wallet.
credentials_success_right_pane_paragraph:
Your {{credentialName}} credential has been
successfully issued to you.

You can use it to verify your identity whenever you
interact with other parties.
credentials_success_right_pane_valid_id_: You have received your Verified Identity credential

The Verified Identity credential proofs that
UnifiedPost has been able to verify that you have a valid ID document
and that you are linked to this valid ID document.

You can use this credential to manage your UnifiedPost account.
credential_verify_request_right_pane_top:
In order to issue a credential we need to get
some information from your wallet.
credential_verify_request_right_pane_bot: Start by scanning this QR code with your Banqup app

Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR
scanner to provide information.

Please click the button to open a wallet
Go back to this screen afterwards to continue.
download_app_right_pane_paragraph:
Please download one of the below DDIP
compliant SSI Wallets if you haven't yet
onboarding_left_card_paragraph:
When you opt to manually enter your data,
please fill in your first- and lastname, along
with your email address to get the
{{credentialName}} credential(s)
onboarding_right_card_paragraph:
Choose to share your data via your wallet.
It's a quick method to provide the
information to get the

{{credentialName}} credential(s)
qrcode_right_pane_bottom_paragraph:
Simply scan the QR code using
your wallet's QR scanner.
mobile_right_pane_bottom_paragraph: Open your wallet app by clicking the 'Open in wallet' button.
qrcode_right_pane_top_paragraph:
A hassle-free way to share your personal
information using your digital wallet.
sharing_data_right_pane_paragraph:
Almost there!
 Please fill out any missing data.
To claim your {{credentialName}}
credential(s). The content will not be stored! It is used to personalize the credentials
sharing_data_fill_out_right_pane_paragra: To get started, please provide us with your details
sharing_data_company_fill_out_right_pane: Please fill in and review your company details.
ssi_information_request_page_form_terms_: I agree to the terms & conditions
coc_sharing_data_right_pane_top_paragrap: Almost there! Please provide any missing details if necessary.
coc_credential_verify_request_right_pane: Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR scanner. When you already on your phone open your wallet by clicking on the Open in wallet button.
ssi_credentials_landing_page_text: You can receive the credentials below in your wallet. Select a credential and follow the necessary steps.
paragraph_add_credential: Let's add the credential to your wallet
paragraph_scan_this_qr: Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR scanner. When you already on your phone open your wallet by clicking on the Open in wallet button.
loading_verify_company_information_descr: Please wait, you will automatically go to the next step.
loading_verify_identity_information_desc: Please wait, you will automatically go to the next step.
